reviewText: This is okay.  For this kind of thing.  There are some really good looking girls bouncing around in bikinis and less.  It's good to watch one time.  But after you've seen it once.  Who really cares.

I  did  not  buy  this  Dvd  just  to  watch  a  bunch  of  girls  run  around  topless. I  just  bought it  to  watch  the  compatition. Because  I'am  that  type  of  person  who will  watch  any  compatition. Like  who  can  get  to  the  rings  the  fastest. Hope  you  all  understand  on  what  I'am  saying  here

I'm fairly happy with GIRLS GONE WILD GAMES. There are 20 girls playing in this, probably all in their late teens and early 20s, many topless or nude and a few in bikinis. But the overall effect of this is not as sexy as it should have been. For one thing, there's so many girls (about 20) playing the games that the camera is seldom close enough on any one girl to get a good look at her. Also, since most of the games are fast-paced, the fast action of the games and the camera quickly switching from one shot to another means there's not much time to enjoy the great views! The whole DVD, including the bonus, runs a little over an hour, and has a good sharp picture. There are some nice slower scenes in between the games - my favorite is a sexy shower with the 5 girls of the "Rack Pack" Red team. Another is a scene in a hotel room with several of the team players topless, focusing on one girl who is a member of the Rack Pack for obvious reasons. However, there's one potentially very sexy scene where one group of girls is giving an oil rub-down to another group, but strangely it's shown for less than half a minute! But the biggest frustration is 2 guys who are doing commentary and are sometimes shown for several minutes at at time! Who wants to see THEM?? Really, the sexiest part of this DVD is the bonus section, which for 15 minutes slows down from the frenetic action of the games and gives us good looks at a very sexy shower girl, two girls giving each other an oil rub-down, and an extended replay of the great shower scene with the Rack Pack team. Admittedly, though, if one wants to see this kind of thing there are plenty of such DVDs out there, and this one IS supposed to be games. But, despite the shortcomings, this DVD is fun to watch, especially with the nice bonus section. The best DVDs I've found of girls playing games or sports in the buff are the Playboy ones called Playboy: X Mates, Vol. 1 - BMX/Wakeboards and Playboy X Mates 2. Another quite good one is Nude Basketball / Nude Football.

I'm a bit disappointed with this.  There are many gorgeous babes in bikinis and some nude but the trouble with there being so many girls is it is so difficult to spread my concentration around and take in all the sights.  Trouble is I order so many DVDs it is not always possible to review the same DVD.  I think I prefer the normal Girls Gone Wild format where you only usually have 1 or 2 girls to focus on at a time!

Overall though it is not too bad and as I say there are plenty of girls [5 per team x 4 teams] some nude, mainly topless and what the hell one shouldn't really complain seeing these girls perform a series of games ala "It's a Knockout" style [not sure if my American cousins would be familar with these type of games we use to have many a year ago]. The only other gripe I have is my team didn't win.
